TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MobileCapabilities extends System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")]

[<System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")>]

summary.span: 为访问有关客户端设备的功能信息和执行设备功能查询提供单个源。

span.span: Provides a single source for accessing capability information about a client device and for performing queries against device capabilities.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

Mobile Device Capabilities

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasCapability (string delegateName, string optionalParameter);
.method public hidebysig instance bool HasCapability(string delegateName, string optionalParameter) cil managed
Public Function HasCapability (delegateName As String, optionalParameter As String) As Boolean
public: bool HasCapability(System::String ^ delegateName, System::String ^ optionalParameter);

param.name: delegateName
param.span: 功能集合中的设备评估方法、属性名称或项。

span.span: The device evaluation method, property name, or item in the capabilities collection.
The optional argument.

summary.span: 提供评估设备功能的统一方法。

span.span: Provides a uniform way to evaluate device capabilities.

summary.span: ASP.NET 在内部使用此方法来实现在控件的语法中表示的各种设备选择条件。

span.span: This method is used internally by ASP.NET to implement various device-selection criteria expressed in the syntax of the controls.

summary.span: 例如，此方法用于在[ < 选择 > 元素 ( .NET Framework 开发人员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3tfbhf6f(v=vs.100))中进行选择，) 可选择的构造中的元素。

span.span: For example, this method is used to choose among [<Choice> Element (.NET Framework Developer's Guide)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3tfbhf6f(v=vs.100)) elements in a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 如果设备具有指定的功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the device has the specified capability; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以 在收集特定于设备的信息时以编程方式使用方法。Applications can use the method programmatically when they gather device-specific information. 如果 `capabilityName` 参数指定设备评估方法，则将 `optionalArgument` 参数传递给此方法。If the `capabilityName` parameter specifies a device evaluation method, the `optionalArgument` parameter is passed to this method. 如果 `capabilityName` 参数在功能字典中指定了属性名称或项，则该 方法将检查该属性或项是否与参数相等 `optionalArgument` 。If the `capabilityName` parameter specifies a property name or item in the capabilities dictionary, the method checks whether the property or item is equal to the `optionalArgument` parameter.

exception.span: 未找到作为配置文件中指定的设备筛选器名称、作为 属性或作为 项集合中某项的一个 参数。

span.span: A parameter is not found as a device-filter name specified in the configuration file, as a property, or as an item in the Item collection.
is or empty.
